title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.4 - Bets by personnel of other corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.4 - Bets by personnel of other corporations

State Regulations

No officer, director, or employee of any firm, entity or
agency that is retained by a corporation or by the commission for the purpose
of supervising the operation or maintenance of the system of off-track betting
may place any bet, directly or indirectly at any branch office, whether
personally or by telephone, or receive any gratuity from any
patron. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4407.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
